title: How to write personal experiences in a textbook chapter in the first person when there are two authors - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are writing any book or textbook for any particular class and want to introduce your personal experience, you can do so very cleverly. There are different types of passages as descriptive, narrative, expository, reflective etc You may narrate your own experience in any short anecdote ,experience etc Similarly you can describe any scene, event ,visit to certain spot,any person you happen to meet etc by using skill of description. You may cite paragraphs,instances,poetic couplets,verse, quotation from other renoun authors,poets,philosophers etc. You may also explain the proposition of a scientist,philosopher,socialist etc in your wrting. By applying different devices,imageries ,figures etc you can make your writing interesting.
